Brāhmana Vagga：1．Brāhmana Vagga．The tenth section of the Majjhima Nikāya，suttas 91-100．

2．Brāhmana Vagga．The sixth chapter of the Tika Nipāta of the Anguttara Nikāya．A．i．155-73．

3．Brāhmana Vagga．The twentieth chapter of the Pañcaka Nipāta of the Anguttara Nikāya．A．iii．221-46．

4．Brāhmana Vagga． See also Yodhājīva Vagga （2）．

5．Brāhmana Vagga．The twenty sixth section of the Dhammapada．
